I never even intended to play casual games on here. I bought this game way before Valve thought it was a good idea to make it free to play and still charge money for some sort of permanent premium badge or something. I haven't touched it ever since it changed the main menu. I only played on wing man or something like that where you shoot people and get better guns until you get a golden knife. I also wanted to just surf nonstop on community servers, or play zombie servers. Pretty good.
Please, I need a break... But I can't stop playing :`C

I really like the gameplay of CS:GO.  The positional audio and the polish of the maps are a rare find among other shooters.  My biggest complaint about CS:GO is hackers ruining the ranked game-mode for just about everyone else.  Not only that but Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment seem to not care as much about stopping this as they could.  They use crowd sourcing to filter out hackers, which isn't a bad idea in itself but they seem to avoid hiring anyone to actually moderate their games and so hackers pop up more often that I would like.

Over all a really good shooter with a long history of fun gameplay and enjoyable times.  Worth a try even today in my personal opinion.
